name: FLock OFF
summary: FLock OFF is a Bittensor subnet designed to incentivize the creation of high-quality datasets for machine learning. Miners generate and upload datasets to Hugging Face, while validators assess their quality by training LoRA (Low-Rank Adaptation) models on a standardized base model (Qwen/Qwen2.5-1.5B-Instruct) and rewarding miners based on performance.
